column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////I ordered the veal chops and my financee had the fried chicken.  Both of our dishes were cooked to perfection.  I recommend the veal to almost anyone
column2: my financee doesn't like veal and she loved the chops.  Fair warning the fried chicken is not like normal fried chicken.  There is no bone
column3: I believe it was all white meat but breast only and no bones.  So it isn't what you would traditionally think of as fried chicken.  The breading was nice and spicy
